import React from 'react' import Back from "../common/back/Back" import "./contact.css" import Header from '../common/heading/Header' const Contact = () => { const map = 'https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m14!1m12!1m3!1d904726.6131739549!2d85.24565535!3d27.65273865!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!5e0!3m2!1sen!2snp!4v1652535615693!5m2!1sen!2snp" width="600" height="450" style="border:0;" allowfullscreen="" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade" ' return (

Contact us

We're open for any suggestion or just to have a chat

ADDRESS:

AKGEC Ghaziabad, UP

EMAIL:

vishalmalyan2005@gmail.com

PHONE:

+ 9520454622

Follow us here

FACEBOOK TWITTER INSTAGRAM LINKEDIN
) } export default Contact
